name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Backend Developer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in building high-performance solutions using **.NET**, **Spring Boot**, and **AWS** technologies. My robust background includes full-stack development experience with **Node.js** and **Python**, which enhances my understanding of backend processes and system integrations. I am committed to creating robust and secure applications that adhere to compliance standards, such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

I have a strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, employing modern software practices for efficient deployment and maintenance. My project experience also includes integrating AI/ML capabilities into platforms for predictive analytics and intelligent automation, utilizing a tech stack that includes **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**. I continuously strive to adopt the latest technologies and methodologies to deliver exceptional results.
